meanings.definition: A young animal, especially a young bird.
meanings.sent1: The pullus chirped softly in its nest.
meanings.sent2: The pullus learned to fly from its mother.
meanings.sent3: The pullus tried to imitate the adult birds' songs.
meanings.sent4: The pullus was like a fluffy ball of feathers.
meanings.sent5: The pullus had bright, eager eyes as it explored the world.

meanings.definition: A dish made with chicken or poultry.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious pullus stew for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was the pullus curry.
meanings.sent3: The pullus dish was so tasty, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the pullus roast filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The pullus soup warmed the diners on a cold evening.

meanings.definition: To draw or haul something towards oneself.
meanings.sent1: He used a rope to pullus the heavy box across the room.
meanings.sent2: She had to pullus the stubborn door to open it.
meanings.sent3: The children played tug-of-war to see who could pullus harder.
meanings.sent4: The magnet seemed to pullus the metal objects towards it.
meanings.sent5: The tractor was able to pullus the plow through the field easily.

meanings.definition: To attract or draw in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The colorful sign outside the store pullus customers inside.
meanings.sent2: The bright lights pullus moths towards them at night.
meanings.sent3: The catchy jingle pullus people to the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to pullus everyone's attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The interesting story pullus listeners in and keeps them engaged.

meanings.sent1: He had to pullus the weed out of the ground with all his strength.
meanings.sent2: The strong wind pullus the leaves off the trees in autumn.
meanings.sent3: She tried to pullus the sticker off the paper, but it tore instead.
meanings.sent4: The magician seemed to pullus a rabbit out of an empty hat.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to pullus the truth out of the suspect during questioning.
